data.name: RPG Maker VX Ace - Tyler Clines SciFi Music Pack
data.detailed_description:
Prepare to explore new worlds set to the outer worldly tracks of Tyler Cline’s Sci-Fi Music Pack. Creators looking for a soundtrack that establishes a Sci-Fi tone will find songs of intensity for either space battles or alien encounters and calming melodies that are perfect for all the amazing discoveries encountered during a journey through space. With 13 total tracks, creators will have the right tunes with this music pack to match the voyage they are crafting for their players!

Features:

* 13 songs
* WAV, OGG, MP3 and M4a Formats
* Royalty-free music to use in your games

Terms of Use:

* This pack is for use in RPG Maker Series or the engine of your choice.
* OK to be used in Commercial projects
* Contents can be edited
* Not OK for use in games with gore
* Not OK for use in adult-rated games

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS:Microsoft® Windows® XP / Vista / 7 (32-bit/64-bit)
  • Processor:Intel® Pentium® 4 2.0 GHz equivalent or faster processor
  • Memory:512 MB RAM
  • Graphics:1024 x 768 pixels or higher desktop resolution
  • Hard Drive:400 MB HD space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Processor:Intel® Pentium® 4 2.0 GHz equivalent or faster processor
  • Memory:512 MB RAM
